response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe holds immense value for you, estimated at $1,500,000. After careful consideration and assessment of its unique features and benefits, I am extending an exclusive offer to you.

We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value, providing you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire it at a highly favorable rate.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am confident that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations, contributing greatly to your endeavors.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
